title: Spacious 4 BR, 2Ba, Modern Kitchen, Rear Deck, W-D
neighborhood: Somerville near new Green line stop & Magoun Sq
posting_body: ['Available September 1st.', 'Spacious 4 Bedroom Apartment centrally located in Spring Hill between Magoun Sq, Porter Sq and Davis Square.', 'It is located just .4 mile from where the new Green Line stop near Magoun Square will be opening soon!', 'Please Text or Call Craig Scanzio at 617-758-9763 and reference ID# 39H-299585454 to setup a showing.', 'When you respond, please leave your full name and the best phone number to call or text you back!', 'PROPERTY INFO', 'ID: 39H-299585454', 'Rent: $3,800 / Month', 'Beds: 4', 'Bath: 2', 'Available Date: 09/01/2022', 'Pet: No Pets', 'Beautiful 4 Bedroom Apt in Somerville !', ' 2 Level Unit on 2nd & 3rd Floors !', '(2) Full Bathrooms!', ' Great Location - Just .4 mile from the new Green Line T Station near Magoun Square !', 'and very convenient to get to Davis Square and Porter Square.', 'Modern Kitchen and Beautiful Rear Deck are great advantages of this Unit!', 'o Great Central Location in Somerville - just 1.1 mile from Davis Square and Porter Sq.', 'o .7 mile from Magoun Square', 'o Living Room, Dining Room, Kitchen and Rear Deck are on 2nd Floor', 'o (1) Bedroom, 1st Bathroom and enclosed Front Porch are also on 2nd Floor Level', 'o Modern Kitchen has nice middle Island and has lots of Cabinets', 'o Kitchen features Stainless Steel Appliances: Refrigerator ,Gas Stove, Oven and Microwave Combo and Dishwasher & Plenty of Counterspace', 'o Laundry- Washer & Dryer off of Kitchen.', 'o (3) Bedrooms are on 3rd Floor along with the 2nd Bathroom !', 'o Hardwood floors throughout Apartment', 'o Great Access to Bus Lines or walking to get into Davis Square and Porter Square with their great restaurants, bars, markets & shops and the Redline T', 'o Easy commuting by Bus Lines or T to get into Boston or all over Somerville', 'o Storage in Basement if needed', 'o Easy Street Parking; can get resident parking year permit from city', 'Deposits of 1st Month, Security Deposit & Brokers’ Fee along with Good Credit and References required with application!', 'FEATURES', 'Ceramic Tiles', 'Deck', 'Dining Room', 'Dishwasher', 'Gas Stove', 'Hardwood Floors', 'High Ceiling', 'Laundry in Unit', 'Living Room', 'Microwave', 'Modern Kitchen', 'Private Deck', 'Spacious', 'Storage in Basement', 'Pricing & availability subject to change.', 'The advertised price & availability must be confirmed at the time of showing.']
